title: Big Thicket National Preserve: Planning
body: Planning       The National Park Service prepares a variety of planning and environmental documents to help guide it in managing park resources. These documents can range from site-specific impact analyses on facility locations to broader park-wide plans for future use and management of a site.   For information on the preserve's current planning efforts, check the Big Thicket National Preserve project page on the National Park Service Planning, Environment, and Public Comment website.   Big Thicket National Preserve Final General Management Plan / Environmental Impact Statement, August 2014.   Record of Decision on Big Thicket National Preserve's General Management Plan / Environmental Impact Statement.
